texts.name: introductory_paragraph
texts.text:
This explorer uses data from the IMF, the Kenyan National Bureau of Statistics and the Ugandan Bureau of Statistics to monitor consumer price inflation (CPI) data on a monthly basis across all countries. You can use this tool to view the data by indicator (for example food prices or transport), or by annual or monthly change.

Click on a country name to view detailed charts that can be downloaded or embedded in articles.

The underlying data for this tool is available here. You can see our series of articles about inflation data in Africa here. A list of national-level authorities that publish inflation data is available here.
